official_title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to prohibit the charging of copayments with respect to prescribed drugs under State medicaid plans.

summary.text: Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to prohibit the charging of copayments with respect to prescribed drugs under a State's Medicaid plan.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to prohibit the charging of copayments with respect to prescribed drugs under State medicaid plans.
